title: camera QR code reader bug
content:
I found a bug in the camera app QR code scanner (android 11, camera app version: 7.5.107):

If you have a QR code with url:
http://somthingnet.hu the camera reads it wrong: http://something.net.hu

It adds an extra dot in front of the "net" word.

The same happens:
k3net.hu -> k3.net.hu
astronet.hu -> astro.net.hu
metnet.hu -> met.net.hu
